DOC.brief_summary: Currently, the study about intervention on the induced abortion at trimester is so little. So, the investigators want to compare the safety and effectiveness of different induced labor.
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison of Oxytocin Induced Labor and Cook Balloon Induced Labor
DOC.detailed_description: In this study , the investigators want to compare the safety and effectiveness of different induced labor. The safety and effectiveness such as the success rate of induced labor and the gestation outcome,etc.
DOC.criteria: Gestation age ≥37week Single fetus No serious complications Gestation age ＜37week Multiple fetus With serious complications
